==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|屮|一|ls=ic|t1=bud|t2=ground}} – [[sprouting]] from the ground.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-riŋ ~ s-r(j)aŋ||to live; to be alive; to give birth; raw; green}}. Cognate with {{cog|my|ရှင်||to live; alive}}, {{cog|lus|hring||to bear; to bring forth; to give birth to; green}}.

{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} proposes that {{cog|sit-pro||*sriŋ}} is derived from the root {{m|sit-pro|*sri||to exist}} (whence possibly Chinese {{och-l|體|body; shape; form}}) + {{m|sit-pro|*-ŋ||''terminative suffix''}}.

Both level tone and falling tone readings are found in Middle Chinese, but the latter has since been lost and is merged into the level-tone reading in modern dialects.

Related to {{och-l|青|blue-green}}, {{och-l|蒼|dark blue; deep green}}.

Derivatives: {{och-l|性|nature; character; personality; quality}}, {{och-l|姓|family name}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[live]]; to [[subsist]]; to [[exist]]
# to [[grow]]; to [[develop]]; to [[bud]]
#* {{zh-x|紅豆 生 南 國。|Red berries '''grow''' in southern lands.}}
# {{lb|zh|causative}} to [[bear]]; to [[give birth]]; to [[bring up]]; to [[rear]]
#* {{zh-x|她 妻子 生 了 一 對 雙胞胎 女孩。|His wife '''gave birth''' to twin girls.}}
#* [http://wordproject.org/multi/bi_en_cn_py.htm John 1.9]
#* {{zh-x|那 光 是 真 光，照亮 一切 生 在 世上 的 人。|That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that '''cometh''' into the world.}}
# to [[be born]]; to [[come]] into [[existence]]
#* {{zh-x|他 生 在 中國。|He '''was born''' in China.}}
# [[offspring]]; [[descendant]]
